greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of steps for S(S(..S(n)..)) to converge, where S is the Kempner function A002034.
reference: Henry Ibstedt, "Smarandache Iterations", Smarandache Notions Journal, (submitted), 1996.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a018194 n = 1 + length (takeWhile (/= 0) $ zipWith (-) ks $ tail ks)
results.author: Henry Ibstedt (Glimminge 2036, 28060 Broby, Sweden)
ext: Corrected and extended by _David W. Wilson_ May 15 1997
